situation.title: Cross-border workers, business trips to the CZ
situation.meta_description: It is possible to travel to the Czech Republic only in strictly necessary cases. Trips to work or to do business (including commuters) are a part of this category.

content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

Cross-border workers may enter the Czech Republic without the necessity of a license to make an entry form or submit the PCR test result if they cross the state border between the Czech Republic and a neighboring state, at least once a week back and forth to work in the Czech Republic or in a neighboring Czech state in a long term time period. More information

It is possible to travel to the Czech Republic in cases, such as work or business-related trips without the necessity of fill in the entry form or submit the test results, only if such stay does not exceed 12 hours period. However, the obligation to wear a medical mask or respirator of at least class FFP2 applies during your stay in the Czech Republic.

Drivers in international freight transport traveling through the Czech Republic to Germany in order to enter the Czech Republic must submit a negative antigen or PCR test result that is not older than 36 hours.

More information can be found on the website of the Ministry of the Interior of the Czech Republic

We also recommend checking the accommodation conditions.

In case of doubts or questions, please call the Ministry of the Interior of the Czech Republic: +420 974 801 801 (Mon - Thu: 8:00 - 16:00 and Fri: 8:00 - 12:00). Or by e-mail: cestovani.covid19@mvcr.cz. Information is available in the Czech and English languages.
